T02D1619:152a-1: yo ga aamba ra no pi ka / bod skad du /
T02D1619:152a-3: shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1619:152a-4: rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba'i gtso //
T02D1619:152a-6: dngos po kun gyis bdag phyag 'tshal //

T02D1619:152a-8: gdan bzhi'i rim pa gsungs pa yi //
T02D1619:152a-9: bde ba'i sgrub thabs btus nas su //

T02D1619:152b-1: de nas gdan bzhi pa'i rgyud kyi rim pas dbang bskur ba thob pa dang /

T02D1619:152b-3: zab mo'i chos la mos pa dang /

T02D1619:152b-6: yid dga' ba'i phyogs su shin tu 'jam pa'i stan
T02D1619:152b-7: la 'dug nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i dbus su
T02D1619:152b-8: bzhugs pa'i rnal 'byor nam mkha'i bsnyen pa bya'o //
T02D1619:152b-9: de la dang por re zhig nyi ma'i lag mthil la ni yi ge aa dmar po bsams nas /
T02D1619:152b-10: dkar po la sogs pa'i lag pa'i sor mo la
T02D1619:152b-11: rim pas sum kshum yum h'um aa sa bon las
T02D1619:152b-12: bskyed pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom par bya'o
T02D1619:152b-13: // de bzhin zla ba'i lag mthil la yi ge som las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la smryum /
T02D1619:152b-17: aom sa bon de dag gis sprul pa'i gi wang
T02D1619:152b-18: la sogs pa'i lag pa'i sor mo padmar rnam par
T02D1619:152b-19: bsgom par bya'o // de dag ni lag pa rnam par dag pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1619:152b-20: de nas mgrin pa la yi ge hr'im: las bskyed
T02D1619:152b-21: pa'i padma 'dab brgyad lce'i 'dab ma la yi ge
T02D1619:152b-23: de'i bum pa la yi ge h'um bskyed cing bsgoms te /
T02D1619:152b-24: aom badzra dzihva sam barta ni h'um phat /

T02D1619:152b-27: de nas nyi ma'i lag pa la dkar po dang

T02D1619:152b-30: spyi bo mig gnyis rna ba gnyis sna lce mgrin pa dpung pa gnyis snying ga lte ba /
T02D1619:152b-33: aom badzra tsitta h'um yan lag byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i cho ga'o //

T02D1619:153a-0: zhes bya ba'i sngags des mchod pa'i zhal bsil gyi @153a * //

T02D1619:153a-18: phyir bzlog snying gar gzhag par bya //

T02D1619:153a-20: bdag la bsrung ba byas nas su //
T02D1619:153a-21: nyi zla bcing ba byas nas su //
T02D1619:153a-22: dri ma gsum dang dud pa bsgreng //
T02D1619:153a-23: nga ro h'um gi ldan byas nas //
T02D1619:153a-24: phyag rgya de ltar bcing bar bya //

T02D1619:153a-26: gdab pa dang dra ba dang ra ba dang kho
T02D1619:153a-27: ra khor yug bcings pa la sogs pa rim pa
T02D1619:153a-28: bzhin du bya'o // rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te //
T02D1619:153a-29: dkar po gi wang bsgreng nas su //
T02D1619:153a-30: kun nas de nyid kha sprad nas //
T02D1619:153a-31: dud pa dri ma gsum bsgrengs nas //
T02D1619:153a-32: de ni rtag tu dbang bskur bya'o //
T02D1619:153a-34: dpral ba dang rna ba g-yas kyi steng dang ltag
T02D1619:153a-35: khung dang rna ba g-yon gyi steng rnams su rnam

T02D1619:153a-49: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan zhing mdzes pa na bzas
T02D1619:153a-51: sngags ni aom h'um aa sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:153a-53: rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te /
T02D1619:153a-54: dkar po gi wang bsgreng nas su //
T02D1619:153b-0: gnyis ka @153b bzlog nas rtse sbyar sprad //
T02D1619:153b-1: rgyab dang snying ga'i cho ga bsrung /
T02D1619:153b-2: sngags ni aom tum h'um sv'a h'a /

T02D1619:153b-7: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcas nas

T02D1619:153b-9: rtse la bzhag nas dang po la 'og nas 'byung

T02D1619:153b-11: dkyil 'khor dmigs nas dri la sogs pas mchod par
T02D1619:153b-12: bya'o // de la sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yin te /
T02D1619:153b-13: nyi ma'i lag pa phye nas su //
T02D1619:153b-14: dud pa dri ma gsum bsgreng ste //
T02D1619:153b-15: aom aargham pra t'itstsha aargham h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:153b-16: nyi ma'i lag pa brkyang nas su //
T02D1619:153b-17: dkar po ye shes sbyar byar bya //

T02D1619:153b-19: ji ltar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam byas te rim

T02D1619:153b-24: nyi ma'i lag pa brkyang bsgreng nas //
T02D1619:153b-25: dri yi phyag rgya dang por sbyar /
T02D1619:153b-28: dkar po ye shes legs sbyar ba //
T02D1619:153b-29: me tog phyag rgya rnam par bsgom /
T02D1619:153b-31: me tog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o //

T02D1619:153b-35: spos kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o /

T02D1619:153b-46: gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //

T02D1619:154a-1: ki ni p'u dzo pasth'a na ya a'tma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /

T02D1619:154a-7: de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1619:154a-8: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
T02D1619:154a-9: rtag par bdag ni skyabs su mchi //

T02D1619:154a-11: sbyor ba gsang ba mkha' 'gro dang //
T02D1619:154a-12: dpa' bo dpa' mo dang lha mo //

T02D1619:154a-18: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun //
T02D1619:154a-19: che ge mo zhes bya ba dag / dus 'di nye bar bzung nas su //
T02D1619:154a-20: snying po byang chub thob pa'i bar //

T02D1619:154a-22: mchog tu bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //

T02D1619:154a-26: dge ba'i chos ni spud pa dang ;
T02D1619:154a-27: / sems can don bya'i tshul khrims kyang //
T02D1619:154a-28: so sor bdag gis brtan por bzung //
T02D1619:154a-29: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02D1619:154a-30: bla med dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog / sdom pa sangs rgyas 'byor bskyed pa //
T02D1619:154a-31: dang po de ring gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1619:154a-32: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //

T02D1619:154a-34: rdo rje chen po'i rigs mchog la //
T02D1619:154a-35: slob dpon nyid du gzung bar bgyi //

T02D1619:154a-37: rin chen 'byung ba'i rigs mchog la //

T02D1619:154a-40: byang chub chen po 'byung ba yi //
T02D1619:154a-41: padma chen po'i rigs dag la //
T02D1619:154a-42: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //

T02D1619:154a-48: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems//

T02D1619:154b-13: mo // aom sv'a bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a sva bh'a ba bi shuddho& ham /

T02D1619:154b-17: rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhis
T02D1619:154b-18: dbyangs kyis bskul bar byed par bsgom par bya'o //

T02D1619:154b-27: las rdo rje // rdo rje'i lte ba la sa

T02D1619:155a-29: me dang chu dang sa rnams zla ba phyed pa

T02D1619:155a-46: sgo bzhi brgyan te grva dang mtshams na zla ba
T02D1619:155a-48: de'i nang na dbus na seng ge //

T02D1619:158b-32: mkhrig ma zla bas gzung bar bya //
T02D1619:158b-34: spos me ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:158b-36: ye shes dkar po sbyar te spyi bor brkyang //
T02D1619:158b-37: rnam shes gi wang sbyar te dku ru brkyang /
T02D1619:158b-38: aom su nri tye sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:158b-39: gar mkhan ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:158b-40: nyi ma khu tshur bcings nas su //
T02D1619:158b-41: ye shes gyen du bsgreng bar bya //
T02D1619:158b-43: mar me'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:158b-44: g-yas kyi sta zur mtshams su ni //
T02D1619:158b-45: zla ba'i lag pa brkyang bar bya //
T02D1619:158b-46: bsgreng nas g-yon gyi phyag na bsnams /
T02D1619:158b-49: nyi ma'i lag pa khar bcug ste //
T02D1619:158b-50: ha ha gad sgrogs bzhad byed pa //
T02D1619:158b-52: mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:158b-53: thal mo spyi bor bzhag pa ni //
T02D1619:158b-55: byang gi 'bar byed ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:158b-56: yi dags thal mo khar bcug ste /
T02D1619:158b-59: zla ba'i khu tshur dam cings te //
T02D1619:158b-60: rna ba'i rtsal sbyar bar bya /
T02D1619:158b-63: phyag rgya thams cad so so ru //
T02D1619:159a-2: thams cad lha mo rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1619:159a-3: rdo rje sgrog gis brtan par bya //
T02D1619:159a-4: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te //
T02D1619:159a-5: rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya //
T02D1619:159a-7: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:159a-8: mda' bkang ba yi tshul du ni //
T02D1619:159a-9: rna bar mda' 'dren thugs bskul lo //
T02D1619:159a-11: mda' 'dzin ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:159a-13: bdag gis lag pa gnyis kyis bzung //
T02D1619:159a-14: aom su pri ya te me h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:159a-15: nu ma 'dzin pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:159a-16: nyi ma'i lag pa phye bas te //
T02D1619:159a-17: dkar po ye shes sbyar bar bya //
T02D1619:159a-18: de yi dud pa la sogs bsgreng //
T02D1619:159a-19: rdo rje phyag rgya bstan par bya //
T02D1619:159a-21: rdo rje sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:159a-22: de nyid zla ba sbyar byas nas //
T02D1619:159a-23: dril bu'i phyag rgyar rab tu grags //
T02D1619:159a-25: dril bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:159a-26: snying gar nyi ma zla ba sbyar //
T02D1619:159a-27: padma sa gdugs bskyad byas nas //
T02D1619:159a-28: gsang ba'i gnas su sbyar bar bya //
T02D1619:159a-29: a'a li'i phyag rgyar grags pa yin //
T02D1619:159a-31: a'a li'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:159a-32: khu tshur byas nas aom bsgreng nas //
T02D1619:159a-35: khu tshur snying gar skul byed cing //
T02D1619:159a-38: ba dan gsum ni gyen bsgreng nas /
T02D1619:159a-41: zla ba gi wang bsgreng ba la //
T02D1619:159a-42: nyi ma'i lag phye nas su //
T02D1619:159a-43: de yi rtse mo kho na sbyar //
T02D1619:159a-46: khu tshur bcings nas dpral ba nas /
T02D1619:159a-47: dud pa dkar po gshibs nas kyang //
T02D1619:159a-48: aom mu mu h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:159a-49: dbang ldan mtshams nas dbang ldan gyi'o //
T02D1619:159a-50: khu tshur gnyis ni gshibs nas su //
T02D1619:159a-51: dkar po gi wang bsgreng byas nas //
T02D1619:159a-52: rtse dang rtse ru kha sprad de //
T02D1619:159a-53: rin chen tshul du sbyar bar bya //
T02D1619:159a-54: aom n'a d'a gre h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:159a-55: me'i mtshams na ku be ra'o //
T02D1619:159a-56: khu tshur byas nas dkar po bsgreng //
T02D1619:159a-57: aom kha de ni h'um phat /
T02D1619:159a-58: bden bral gyi mtshams na 'byung po'i bdag po'o //
T02D1619:159a-59: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
T02D1619:159a-60: dud pa dkar po bsgreng bar bya /
T02D1619:159a-61: aom bhur bhu wa sv'a h'a //
T02D1619:159a-62: rlung gi mtshams na ba ru na'o //
T02D1619:159a-63: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te //
T02D1619:159a-64: dud pa dri ma gsum bsgreng nas //
T02D1619:159b-0: rtse dang @159b rtse mo kha sprad de //
T02D1619:159b-1: sems ma rdo rje rab tu grags //
T02D1619:159b-2: phyag rgya de ni keng rus 'jigs byed la sogs pa rnams kyi thun mong du bstan pa'o //
T02D1619:159b-3: sngags ni rang rang gi sngags brjod de shes par bya'o //
T02D1619:159b-33: mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i'o //
T02D1619:159b-36: de dag ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
T02D1619:159b-37: chos kyi phyag rgya ni lha dang rang gi lce'i
T02D1619:159b-38: padma'i 'dab ma la de'i dbus su rang gi sngags
T02D1619:159b-39: kyi yi ge rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1619:159b-40: de ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:159b-41: las kyi phyag rgya ni sngon bzhin du bcing ba gong ma dang 'dra ste /
T02D1619:159b-42: lha dang rang gi thugs kar yi ge aa las
T02D1619:159b-43: rdo rje rgya gram bsams te phyag mtshan med par
T02D1619:159b-44: 'ching ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:159b-45: phyag mtshan de kho na phyag mtshan dang ldan par byas te /
T02D1619:159b-46: rnal 'byor nam mkha' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po yin no //
T02D1619:159b-47: de nas rnal 'byor nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha
T02D1619:159b-48: rnams la sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad
T02D1619:159b-49: kyis rim pa bzhin du mchod de zla ba nyi
T02D1619:159b-51: dud pa dri ma gsum bsgreng ste /
T02D1619:159b-52: phyag rgya des ni yon chab dbul lo //
T02D1619:159b-53: aom aargham prat'itstsha aargham h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:159b-54: yang me tog la sogs pas mchod do /
T02D1619:159b-55: pra wa ra satk'a ra pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:159b-56: de nas gong ma bzhin du dri la sogs pas
T02D1619:159b-57: mchod de mchod pa nyi shu bas kyang rim pa
T02D1619:159b-59: de la nyi shu 'di lta ste /
T02D1619:159b-60: so so re re gar byas nas //
T02D1619:159b-61: sngon du sgeg pa la sogs pa bcing ngo //
T02D1619:159b-62: de nas bi wang ga tshul dang /
T02D1619:160a-9: rdza rda brdung ba'i tshul dang /
T02D1619:160a-10: rda pa ta ha brdung ba'i tshul dang /
T02D1619:160a-16: rdo rje gsor ba'i tshul dang /
T02D1619:160a-18: thal mo sbyor ba'i tshul lo //
T02D1619:160a-19: sngags ni kun la h'um sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1619:160a-20: rdo rje de bzhin du ni gzung bya'o //
T02D1619:160a-21: dril bu chos su gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1619:160a-22: aom badzra ghande ra ni ta pra ra ni ta
T02D1619:160a-23: sam pra ra ni ta sarbba buddha kshe tra pra
T02D1619:160a-24: tsa li te pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a n'a
T02D1619:160a-25: d'a sra bh'a wa h'um h'um h'um ho:/
T02D1619:160a-26: dril bu dkrol nas de dag la sogs pa'i mchod pa bya'o //
T02D1619:160a-27: dpal ldan sku gsung thugs las grol ba'i zhal gsum pa //
T02D1619:160a-28: 'gying bag khro bo dgod pa de bzhin spyan yang gsum //
T02D1619:160a-29: klu dbang nor bu'i 'od mdog shin tu mdzes pa'i sku //
T02D1619:160a-30: phyag mtshan drug gis mtshan ba'i phyag mchog drug /
T02D1619:160a-31: kha tv'am lhung bzed ral gri dgra sta rdo rje
T02D1619:160a-32: dril bu 'dzin // ha ha la sogs gang sgrogs dmyal ba'i lang ling gcod byed pa //
T02D1619:160a-33: thar par phyin pa'i srid pa'i rang bzhin skye ba'i
T02D1619:160a-34: mchog / ye shes mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs gnyis
T02D1619:160a-35: phyag 'tshal bstod // dpal ldan sangs rgyas mi gzugs mdzes pa'i sku mdog dkar po'i sku //
T02D1619:160a-36: byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi dam pas gang ba'i snod 'dzin pa ;
T02D1619:160a-37: / mgon med sems can kun don dkon mchog gsum skyabs mdzad //
T02D1619:160a-38: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1619:160a-39: dpal ldan rin chen spyi gzugs shin tu gser mdog sku //
T02D1619:160a-40: kha tv'am bdud rtsi dam pas bkang ba'i lhung bzed 'dzin //
T02D1619:160a-41: sdug bsngal sems can mang po tshim par byed pa'i sku //
T02D1619:160a-42: drag mo mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1619:160a-43: dpal ldan chos kyi spyi gzugs padma r'a ga'i mdog
T02D1619:160a-44: / kha tv'am yar bsgreng drag mo'i ro can 'dzin
T02D1619:160a-45: pa po // kun 'gro la sogs srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod byed ma //
T02D1619:160a-46: ro langs mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1619:160b-0: @160b dpal ldan las kyi spyi gzugs mdog ljang don yod gzugs //
T02D1619:160b-1: kha tv'am drag mo mi yi thod pa sar ba 'dzin //
T02D1619:160b-2: 'dod pa'i nyon mongs srid pa'i 'ching byed gcod byed ma //
T02D1619:160b-3: gdol ba'i mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1619:160b-4: dpal ldan seng ge ma dang stag mo ce sbyang 'ug mgo ma //
T02D1619:160b-5: sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang ni dge ba'i lcags kyu dgra sta can //
T02D1619:160b-6: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mang po thams cad gcod mdzad ma //
T02D1619:160b-7: sprul pa'i sku rnams khyed kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1619:160b-8: mkha' 'gro mar me 'jib byed 'phrog byed khyed rnams ni //
T02D1619:160b-9: mchog tu sa rnams srung bar byed pa drag po rnams //
T02D1619:160b-10: sdang ba gdul dka' gzhan gyi rig pa gcod mdzad ma //
T02D1619:160b-11: lha yi mkha' 'gro ma kun zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1619:160b-12: sgeg mo yid dga' yid 'ong phreng bad dbyangs len ma //
T02D1619:160b-13: gar sogs dbyangs sgrar gar gyi yan lag dgu /
T02D1619:160b-14: sna tshogs rnam bkod me tog mchog gi spos rno
T02D1619:160b-15: ba // ye shes snang ba mar me dri zhim zhing //
T02D1619:160b-16: dpa' bo dbang mchog rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo ni //
T02D1619:160b-17: sbyor ba shin tu sbyor ba sbyor ba chen po la //
T02D1619:160b-18: lus ngag yid kyis chags pas nan tan drag tu ni //
T02D1619:160b-19: dpal ldan gsang ba'i gdan mchog mchod nas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1619:160b-20: dpal ldan de nyid rgyal po dam ba dbang phyug spyi gzugs kyis //
T02D1619:160b-21: dpal ldan gsang ba'i gdan mchog 'od zer rab 'bar ba //
T02D1619:160b-22: dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu dkrol sbyor de bzhin nyid //
T02D1619:160b-23: dpal ldan ye shes brten pa'i dbang phyug longs spyod 'dud //
T02D1619:160b-24: de ltar bstod pa byas nas dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D1619:160b-25: aom shuddho ma ma h'um aa aa aa aam sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:160b-26: de nas thams cad sbyor ba bzhi la sogs pa'i
T02D1619:160b-27: sbyor ba chen po'i bar du chos thams cad bdag
T02D1619:160b-28: med pa'i rang bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1619:160b-29: ji srid mi skyo'i bar du'o //
T02D1619:160b-30: skyo bar gyur na gong ma bzhin du mchod pa
T02D1619:160b-31: thams cad kyis mchod nas rim pa bzhis gtor ma
T02D1619:160b-33: dang po dkyil 'khor mdun du byas nas phyag rgya 'dis dgug par bya'o //
T02D1619:160b-34: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te //
T02D1619:160b-35: rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya //
T02D1619:160b-36: sa gdugs padmas dkris nas su //
T02D1619:161a-2: dkar po dgug nas 'dren pa ni //
T02D1619:161a-3: lha rnams dgug pa'i dam pa'o //
T02D1619:161a-4: dgug pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'o //
T02D1619:161a-5: aom batt'a li ma h'a batt'a li h'um h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:161a-6: dgug pa'i dam tshig gi sngags so //
T02D1619:161a-7: de nas yon chab dang khrus chab dbul lo //
T02D1619:161a-8: di dang me tog dang spos dang 'byor pa ji
T02D1619:161a-9: bzhin du bsten pa zas lcags kyu lnga la sogs
T02D1619:161a-10: pa dang / zan dang sran ma la sogs pa
T02D1619:161a-11: dang nya skam po dang byis skyu dang ldan pa'i
T02D1619:161a-12: gtor ma'i snod la lag pas reg pas sngags 'di
T02D1619:161a-13: bzlas pas gtor ma sbyin no /
T02D1619:161a-14: aom shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang //
T02D1619:161a-15: ri brags dang ni phyugs kyi lhas / yul gyi mdo dang lam dang zhing //
T02D1619:161a-16: khyad par du ni khyim stong dang //
T02D1619:161a-17: snod dang thang dang sa steng dang //
T02D1619:161a-18: khyad par gdol ba'i khyim gnas dang //
T02D1619:161a-19: nag po drag po drag chen po //
T02D1619:161a-20: lha min mnyam du bsten pa dang //
T02D1619:161a-21: nag po gtsigs byed 'jigs byed pa //
T02D1619:161a-22: dga' las 'das dang bgegs rgyal po //
T02D1619:161a-23: dga' byed ma dang drag mo dang //
T02D1619:161a-24: 'jigs byed ma dang au mas bstod //
T02D1619:161a-25: rgyal mo rnam par rgyal dbang mo //
T02D1619:161a-26: thub med gzhan gyis mi thub ma //
T02D1619:161a-27: nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo //
T02D1619:161a-28: nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1619:161a-29: dbang byed ma dang zla ba mo //
T02D1619:161a-30: nag mo sdang ba'i lam pa ki //
T02D1619:161a-31: 'phrog byed ma dang me mar ma //
T02D1619:161a-33: drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo //
T02D1619:161a-34: mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma //
T02D1619:161a-35: kha tv'am rdzu 'phrul chen mo dang //
T02D1619:161a-36: ral gri dgra sta'i lag pa gang //
T02D1619:161a-37: rdo rje de bzhin chu lag dang //
T02D1619:161a-38: mkha' 'gro lnga yi de nyid che //
T02D1619:161a-39: las kun rjes su sgrub pa yi //
T02D1619:161a-40: sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po //
T02D1619:161a-41: rdo rje'i dbang phyug de bzhin gtso //
T02D1619:161a-42: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po //
T02D1619:161a-43: gos med sbyor ba skyed byed ma //
T02D1619:161a-44: rdo rje dbang phyug ma yi bkas //
T02D1619:161a-45: thams cad thams cad dgug pa'o //
T02D1619:161a-46: aom kakka dha na babbandha na spyan drangs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:161a-47: khakhkha dha na h'um h'um h'um phat phat ram sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:161a-48: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya de nyid las dkar po dang gi wang bsgreng ba'o //
T02D1619:161a-49: aom batt'a li batt'a li h'um h'um h'um ho: sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:161a-50: dga' bar bya ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:161b-0: gtor ma'i snod bzhag ste rdo rje bcings te ral gri byug @161b pa'i tshul du byas te /
T02D1619:161b-1: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02D1619:161b-2: a'adya nutpanna tv'a ta aom gum sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:161b-3: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pas kyang mchod de bstod pa bya zhing dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D1619:161b-4: sems dpa' chen po dang po mchog //
T02D1619:161b-5: dga' ba chen po dga' ba che //
T02D1619:161b-6: kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag //
T02D1619:161b-7: rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso //
T02D1619:161b-8: thugs kyi sems dpa' ting 'dzin mchog //
T02D1619:161b-9: rdo rje rdo rje chen po'i stobs //
T02D1619:161b-10: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i mchog / bdud dang bdud ni rab 'joms pa //
T02D1619:161b-11: kun gyi khro bo khro chen po //
T02D1619:161b-12: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos skyes sogs //
T02D1619:161b-13: rdo rje h'um byed h'um byed pa //
T02D1619:161b-14: 'jig rten dbang phyug nor bu sbyin //
T02D1619:161b-15: chags pa chen po bde ba che //
T02D1619:161b-16: 'dod pa thar pa nor chen po //
T02D1619:161b-17: srid gsum 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog //
T02D1619:161b-18: 'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum la //
T02D1619:161b-19: mi g-yo rab mchog mi gsal ga /
T02D1619:161b-20: shin tu phra ba rab 'dus pa //
T02D1619:161b-21: g-yo dang ra ba mchog thob pa yi //
T02D1619:161b-22: srid dang 'khor ba dag byed pa //
T02D1619:161b-23: thog ma med pa tha med pa //
T02D1619:161b-24: 'dod chags dag pa ting 'dzin mchog / sna tshogs 'dod chags dbang phyug che //
T02D1619:161b-25: nam mkha'i mtha' las rtag pa'i don //
T02D1619:161b-26: 'byung ba chen po kun gyi gzhi //
T02D1619:161b-27: longs spyod dpal gyi rgyal po gtso //
T02D1619:161b-28: 'dod pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa //
T02D1619:161b-30: gus pas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1619:161b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' rab grub bstod //
T02D1619:161b-32: bdag gis cho ga ma tshang ba rnams ni bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol //
T02D1619:161b-33: khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzod //
T02D1619:161b-34: dngos grub gsol nas ci bder gshegs //
T02D1619:161b-35: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D1619:161b-36: slar yang 'dir ni gshegs su gsol //
T02D1619:161b-37: phyi rol lha rnams kyang se gol gsum dang sngags 'dis gtang bar bya'o//
T02D1619:161b-38: aom gatstsha gatstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:161b-39: ji ltar sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams rang gi dbugs kyis drangs nas /
T02D1619:161b-40: rang gi lus la zhugs te /
T02D1619:161b-41: rang gi gnas la dgod par bya'o //
T02D1619:161b-42: 'di lta ste spyi bo mig dang rna ba dang sna dang /
T02D1619:161b-43: lce la go rims bzhin du drag mo'i mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D1619:162a-2: ro langs ma'i mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D1619:162a-3: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams dgod do //
T02D1619:162a-7: 'ug pa ma rnams go rims bzhin du mgrin pa dang /
T02D1619:162a-8: dpung pa gnyis dang snying ga dang //
T02D1619:162a-9: lte ba rnams la dgod do //
T02D1619:162a-10: sgo ba bzhi ni brla g-yas g-yon dang rje ngar la'o //
T02D1619:162a-11: pukka s'i la sogs pa go rims bzhin du lce'i
T02D1619:162a-12: thig le'i steng du pukka s'i la sogs pa bstim
T02D1619:162a-13: par bya'o // brang la sogs pa'i yan lag lnga
T02D1619:162a-14: la ni drag mo la sogs pa bstim par bya'o
T02D1619:162a-15: par bya'o // // kha'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs nas gtum mo la sogs pa bstim par bya'o //
T02D1619:162a-16: so'i phreng ba dang lce la yang thod phreng ma la sogs pa bstim par bya'o //
T02D1619:162a-17: de dag gi bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i snod ni lus la byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1619:162a-18: 'jig rten gyi lha tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug la
T02D1619:162a-19: sogs pa ni ba spu'i bu ga dang rkang pa
T02D1619:162a-20: la sogs pa la go rims bzhin du thim /
T02D1619:162a-21: keng rus 'jigs byed la sogs pa'i byang chub sems
T02D1619:162a-22: dpa' bcu drug ni rnal 'byor nam mkha'i dbugs dang
T02D1619:162a-25: nu ma'i bar du dri chab ma'o //
T02D1619:162a-26: mgrin pa la pi wang ma'o //
T02D1619:162a-27: mgo po la me tog ma'o //
T02D1619:162a-28: so'i phreng ba gnyis la dbyangs ma'o //
T02D1619:162a-30: dpung pa gnyis por gar byed ma'o //
T02D1619:162a-31: mig gnyis la mar me ma'o //
T02D1619:162a-32: gzugs kyi rnam pa'am ngo bo nyid du rnam par bsam /
T02D1619:162a-33: dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo rnam 'byor nam mkha' bdag go zhes nga rgyal gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1619:162a-36: go cha bgo byas nas rdo rjer pa la sogs pa bsams nas gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1619:162a-41: rtag tu shin tu mnyam par gzhag nas lha dang bdag gi sbyor ba bsgom //
T02D1619:162a-42: de dag ni shin tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
T02D1619:162a-43: de nas longs spyong rnal 'byor ba bzhin du ji
T02D1619:162a-44: snyed dam tshig gi rdzas de dag gis tshogs kyi
T02D1619:162a-45: 'khor lo'i zas rim par mchod pa 'dis bya'o //
T02D1619:162a-46: yi ge kshum gis dga' bar bya ba dang //
T02D1619:162a-47: yi ge yum gis dag par bya ba dang /
T02D1619:162a-48: yi ge h'um gis mkhregs par bya ba dang /
T02D1619:162b-0: yi ge sum @162b gyis bdud rtsir bya'o //
T02D1619:162b-1: yi ge h'um gis ro mnyam por bya ba dang /
T02D1619:162b-2: padma'i snod la bzhag la nyi ma'i lag pa la bdud rtsi'i snod bzhag nas //
T02D1619:162b-3: zla ba'i lag pa'i mthe bong dang srin lags dang ri rab tu bsgom //
T02D1619:162b-4: aom ha: ho: hr'i: sa bon gyi sku gsung thugs
T02D1619:162b-5: gzugs dang dri dang ro dang dpa' bo lha gsum
T02D1619:162b-6: gyi bdag nyid gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i rang bzhin dkyil
T02D1619:162b-7: 'khor gyi lha re re'i 'khor lo la mthe bong
T02D1619:162b-8: dang srin lag gis 'thor 'thung sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1619:162b-9: de nas mchod nas phyag byas te de nas rang
T02D1619:162b-10: gi lus la gnas pa'i lha dang 'khor lo'i lha
T02D1619:162b-11: ji ltar dga' bar tshim par bya'o //
T02D1619:162b-12: de kho na bzhin du tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i go
T02D1619:162b-13: cha la yang sbyor ba gsum gyi rang bzhin lha'i
T02D1619:162b-14: sbyor ba la gnas nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo la
T02D1619:162b-15: mchod par bya'o // 'di lta ste dpral ba dang
T02D1619:162b-16: spyi bo dang lce'i rtse mo la thig le gsum
T02D1619:162b-17: byin nas ji ltar bde bar bya'o //
T02D1619:162b-18: de ltar mngon sum du dga' ba yul gyi mchod pa rnams kyis /
T02D1619:162b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod nas //
T02D1619:162b-20: yongs su rdzogs pa la gong ma bzhin du me tog la sogs pas rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D1619:162b-21: de'i 'og tu lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1619:162b-22: tshigs bcad bzlas nas gtang bar bya'o //
T02D1619:162b-24: aom batt'a li batt'a li tshe /
T02D1619:162b-25: aom ku ru ku ru batt'a li ma h'a batt'a li sv'a h'a /
T02D1619:162b-26: dur khrod nag mo dngos grub zhal //
T02D1619:162b-27: gtum mo 'jigs byed yi dags la //
T02D1619:162b-28: dam tshig srin mo khrag dga' ma //
T02D1619:162b-29: k'i li k'i li sgra sgrogs ma //
T02D1619:162b-30: dur khrod ro yi tshal dbus su //
T02D1619:162b-31: tshogs dang pho nya bcas pa ru //
T02D1619:162b-32: 'jig rten gtum mo dud sol ma ;
T02D1619:162b-33: / gsol cig bzhes shig dam tshig ma //
T02D1619:162b-34: gnas nas dbang du mdzad du gsol //
T02D1619:162b-35: tishtha siddhi ku ru hu tu aom phrom ha gri
T02D1619:162b-36: ha sarba dusht'a phum phem phrom phrim phat sv'a h'a
T02D1619:162b-37: / rdo rje dam pa bcings nas su //
T02D1619:162b-38: dkar po gi wang bsgreng nas su //
T02D1619:162b-39: gnyis ka rtse mo bkug nas ni //
T02D1619:162b-40: kha yi 'gram du gzhag par bya //
T02D1619:162b-41: lhag ma'i gtor ma byin gyis rlobs //
T02D1619:162b-42: dud pa sol ba zhes bya ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1619:162b-43: bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha' dang ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs //
